title: Linderidge 137
creator_credit: New Cinema Workshop and Paul Denby
brief_description: Investigates the conventions of storytelling and suspense. The central theme examines the process whereby women in film are represented as the victims of threat and aggression, as the object of the camera’s voyeuristic gaze.
